abstract: The credit line was a condition of its sale last year from Daimler to Cerberus Capital Management.
snippet: The credit line was a condition of its sale last year from Daimler to Cerberus Capital Management.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT (Dow Jones)  Chrysler made use of a $2 billion credit line that was a condition of its sale last year from Daimler to Cerberus Capital Management, Daimler reported Tuesday.

headline.main: Chrysler Taps a $2 Billion Credit Line
headline.print_headline: Chrysler Taps a $2 Billion Credit Line
